entry.title: $2000 // beautiful one bedroom and one bathroom apartment for rent
entry.content: Perfect gem of a one bedroom! This West End Avenue coop offers prewar charm, Eastern light and a beautifully renovated kitchen and windowed bath. The apartment's living room and bedroom both face the trees of West End Ave. The open kitchen offers flexibility in cooking and dining spaces and features stylish dark cabinets, stainless steel appliances and cool white counters. The cozy bedroom has an ensuite white marble bath. There's a dramatic entry hall adding extra gallery space for your artwork and showcasing the apartment's high ceilings and solid wood floors. The location couldn't be better, with shopping (Whole Foods, Trader Joe's), restaurants and recreation all nearby. The 96th Street subway and Riverside Park are each a block away. Upper West Side living at its best!
